name: Super Dragonfly Chronicles
description:
Play as Mark West in his path to find the truth behind his father's death and the power he has gotten.

Classic 2D Adventure-Action Game, full of challenge and fun for single player. Make your way through challenging levels, deadly creatures, and epic boss fights to watch the history of the game coming alive though amazing comic book art cutscenes.

Prepare yourself 'cause this is next level challenge.
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®4

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
